abstractText: D16, D50, and D84 arethe diameters of the 16th, 50th, and 84th percentile streambed particles from fast water channel units.Within a site, 210 particles are measured at 10 transects in fast-water turbulent and non-turbulent channel units. The data collection method is described at:https://www.monitoringmethods.org/Method/Details/4059Percentiles are calculated using a logarithmic interpolation.
title: D16, D50, and D84 Particle Size in Riffles Calculation v2.0
